channel.title: Skateboardify
channel.description: Shop for everything skateboard related, stay up to date with everything we post!

item.title: New skateboards!
item.description: We just got a bunch of new skateboards we would like you to look at.

item.title: Brand new longboards
item.description: For a long ride, longboards are the way to go.

item.title: Grab your electric skateboard
item.description: Stop sweating and let the machine do all the work for you.

item.title: New set of wheels
item.description: Throw those rusty wheels away and grab a new pair.

item.title: Good trucks are essential
item.description: For your safety and ride comfortability, get new trucks.
